amendment.description: Amendment restores funding for the Abandoned Mine Land Reclamation pilot program by $32,491,000, while reducing EPA's Environmental Programs and Management by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 115-297 to restore funding for the Abandoned Mine Land Reclamation pilot program to its 2017 level, while reducing EPA's Environmental Programs and Management by the same amount ($32,491,000).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 205 (Roll no. 472).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (PA) amendment (A066) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 205 (Roll no. 472).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Thompson (PA).
